pr_title: Update rainbow paren colors, move setting in pref pane

timeline.message: fix small source_columns value error in pref pane, move rainbow paren setting to Display pref pane, update rainbow paren colors to use colorspace hcl

timeline.bodyText: @melissa-barca This was returning undefined for me and I couldn't open the global options. Unfortunately Java doesn't have the tools to check if a primitive type is undefined. Transpiling is so 🤦. I noticed that you were checking if this was defined in other places but I think because of the order of Ginjection this was undefined for me higher up the chain. Not sure if you would prefer to tackle this in a different way.
timeline.author: adamconroy

replies.bodyText: Looks good thank you for updating this 👍
replies.author: melissa-barca
